EmailTemplate.subject: We're sorry you missed our La Prairie workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}}, We’re sorry we missed you at the La Prairie event. Because we value your continued patronage, we’d like to offer you this limited edition Perrier Jouët Belle Époque 2007 “Small Discoveries” by mischer’traxler. Using the Belle-Époque Vintage 2007 bottle as a creative medium, design studio mischer’traxler reinterpreted the language of Art Nouveau. You can bring home this work of art for RSP: $288. This offer is for limited time only so we encourage you to avail of it as soon as possible. For private purchase, please contact sgsales@pernod-ricard.com.sg <[[mailto:sgsales@pernod-ricard.com.sg?subject=Private purchase for Belle Epoque 2007 Mischer’Traxler Limited Edition]]>. Your Sincerely,
Perrier-Jouët Singapore
